#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
long double ans[1000000];
int main()
{
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	ans[0] = 0;
	ans[1] = 1;
	long double fac = 1;
	for(int i=2;i<1000000;++i)
	{
		ans[i] = i*ans[i-1]+fac;
		ans[i-1]/=fac;
		fac = fac*i;
	}
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n;
		cin>>n;
		printf("%.3Lf\n",ans[n] );
	}
	return 0;
}
